attributes.action: have stricter rules on the ratings of violent films and abolish violent films altogether
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having suffered from PTSD (Post Traumatic Syndrome) for the past four after seeing clips from a violent film i wish to set up a petition against them as they destroyed a part of me and i fear that this may even happen to younger children.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
